title: Acupuncture
description: Acupuncture is a form of Traditional Chinese Medic
cleaned_text: Acupuncture is a form of Traditional Chinese Medicine and is one of the oldest systems of medicine dating back 4,000 years. Acupuncture works by using tiny needles to stimulate the body's innate healing mechanism for improved health and well-being. The National Institute of Health indicates that acupuncture is effective for a variety of health conditions. Acupuncture can be part of an integrative approach to for your health and wellbeing. Acupuncture is available for students, faculty and staff. Acupuncture uses Acupuncture can be helpful
